result.title: python3 support numpy?
result.content: when I try to deal with 2B:the least round way with python3, I got Memory limit, so I decided to use Numpy to reduce the useage of the memory and CPU, but unfortunately I got runtime error this time, what I want to ask is, do codeforces support Numpy and other program library? If not, how could I use these library in codeforces?
